mapper.select: select e.coverURL, e.title, e.author, nvl(starp.staravg, 0) staravg from ebook e left outer join (select ebook_no , avg(starrating) staravg from star group by ebook_no) starp on (starp.ebook_no = e.ebook_no) where e.EBOOK_NO in( select ebook_no from (select ebook_no , count(*) as borrowCount from borrow where BORROWDATE > TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1),'MM') and BORROWDATE < LAST_DAY(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, -1)) group by ebook_no ) where rownum<11 )
